name: Amphibian Arsenal
description:
"I’d kiss a frog even if there was no promise of a Prince Charming popping out of it. I love frogs."
- Cameron Diaz.

Fight through water pollution and enemies ready to eat you. You have 30 minutes until the river is overrun with oil. Can you make it to the end?

Controls
  • Arrow Keys: Movement / GUI Selection
  • Z: Shooting
  • X: Bombing
  • ESC: Pause Menu
Credits

Epic Toon FX by Archanor VFX

Feel by More Mountains

Everything else done by us, Plutonium Pigeons (SnifflyPigeon🍊 and myself).

Extra

This game was made for the Mini Jam 106: Frogs².

Incorporating frogs was easy, but we were wondering how to add the limited time that's more than just "beat the level in X minutes" kind of thing. So, we decided upon a game-spanning timer. You have as many attempts to beat the game as you want, but all has to be within the time limit!
